pages.title: ⍟ Eight of Pentacles ⍟
pages.text: Spirit of Prudence$(br)      ☉ Sun in ♍ Virgo

A young artist labors over a coin, carefully etching out a pentacle shape.$(br)  Seven other similar pentacle engraved coins, each one more beautifully crafted than the other, surround the workspace.$(br)  In the horizon, a small town; they have distanced themselves from the distractions of communal life as to dedicate to their skillful work.$(br)  They are concentrated, eager to do a good job and avoid any mistakes; with due patience their expertise improves.

This card suggests a journey through difficult or painful issues to a more honest expression of who we are, sometimes through art. $(br2)$(l)Divinatory meanings$()$(br)  Self-expression, honesty, confrontation with harsh or disturbing issues, a process of creating a meaningful life.$(br)  Craftsmanship, perhaps in the preparatory stage.
$(l)Reversed$()$(br)  Beauty, perfection, especially in work.$(br)  Possibly misused creativity turned to compulsion, vanity, or intrigue.
